text: Imam Omar Suleiman is the Founder and President of the Yaqeen Institute for Islamic Research, and an Adjunct Professor of Islamic Studies in the Graduate Liberal Studies Program at SMU (Southern Methodist University). He is also the Resident Scholar at Valley Ranch Islamic Center and Co-Chair Emeritus of Faith Forward Dallas at Thanks-Giving Square. == References == == Further reading == * Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Imams Category:American YouTubers Category:People from New Orleans
title: Omar Suleiman (imam)
